pr_title: move non translatable strings to according file and mark them as non-translatable

timeline.author: Lineflyer
timeline.diffHunk: @@ -1539,13 +1506,10 @@ To make geocaching easier, to make users lazier. - carnero Support Website - Facebook c:geo page - Twitter Google Play

replies.bodyText: I had not included Google Play as I was unsure whether it has the same name in all languages. - Just cross checked with current translation files: At least in values-ko variant it differs (see string market_title).
replies.author: moving-bits

timeline.bodyText: For these units I am unsure, whether they could be different in a different alphabet, like e.g. greek, cyrillic, etc?
timeline.author: Lineflyer
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1651,13 +1614,6 @@
         <item quantity="other">Add this cache to favorites (%d remaining)</item>
     </plurals>
 
-    <!-- distance units -->
-    <string name="unit_m">m</string>
-    <string name="unit_km">km</string>
-    <string name="unit_ft">ft</string>
-    <string name="unit_yd">yd</string>
-    <string name="unit_mi">mi</string>
-

replies.bodyText: Ok, will revert this part - most languages use the original abbreviations, but some languages have translated the full names.
replies.author: moving-bits

timeline.message: move non translatable string to according file and mark them as non-translatable
move non translatable string to according file and mark them as non-translatable
